Package net.mtrop.doom.map.data.flags

Interface ZDoomThingFlags

All Superinterfaces:
HexenThingFlags
public interface ZDoomThingFlags
extends HexenThingFlags
Thing flag constants for ZDoom things. The constant value is how many places to bit shift 1 to equal the flag bit.
Author:
Matthew Tropiano

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static int EASY
    Thing flag: Appears on easy difficulty.
    static int FRIENDLY
    Thing flag: Thing starts friendly to players.
    static int HARD
    Thing flag: Appears on hard difficulty.
    static int INVISIBLE
    Thing flag: Appears invisible.
    static int MEDIUM
    Thing flag: Appears on medium difficulty.
    static int STANDING
    Thing flag: Thing starts in standing mode.
    static int TRANSLUCENT
    Thing flag: Appears translucent.

    Fields inherited from interface net.mtrop.doom.map.data.flags.HexenThingFlags

    AMBUSH, CLERIC, COOPERATIVE, DEATHMATCH, DORMANT, FIGHTER, MAGE, SINGLEPLAYER

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    default int value​(int flag)
    Gets the bit value of the flag (shifted).
